hanzi-su-wiki:
届

Значения

Доставать, достигать; прибывать, доходить; докладывать, заявлять; доставлять

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Экскременты, плод 由 от присевшего человека 尸. Регулярно сообщать о том, что выгребная яма полна, и удалять из неё экскременты.

  • "Посылка была доставлена в мой дом."

Варианты

屆
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiè
to arrive at (place or time); period; to become due; classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)
прибыть (место или время); период; стать причитающимся; классификатор событий, встреч, выборов, спортивных матчей, лет (выпускных)
rtega_mnemonic:
屆屆RS
届届		a numerary adjunct for periodic terms or events, expire, reach, arrive, deliver
  • corpses 尸 of plants (seeds) in dirt 凷 which shoot in spring time 由: periodic event arriving at the same time each year, the seeds need to be delivered to the farmer before he can plant them
purpleculture_examples:
本届 [ běn jiè ]: current; this year
首届 [ shǒu jiè ]: first session (of a conference etc)
届时 [ jiè shí ]: when the time comes; at the scheduled time
历届 [ lì jiè ]: all previous (meetings, sessions etc)
应届 [ yīng jiè ]: this year's; the current year's
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 尸 [ shī ] body, corpse
    • 由 [ yóu ] cause, reason; from
heisig_chinese_memo: In the US, when the mail is delivered, a flag sprouts up on your mailbox. The flag will fall due to the automatic sensor when you get the mail.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: deliver, reach, arrive, report, notify, forward
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: доставить, охват, прибыть, отчет, уведомляет вперед
koohiiStory1: In the US, when the mail is delivered, a flag sprouts up on your mailbox. (We don´t have that in Australia.).
koohiiStory2: A Japanese man ordered some Brussel sprouts from Belgium. They are delivered with a little Belgian flag (as seen sometimes in shops, little flags indicating the provenance and authenticity of the food like cheese and meat).
kunYomi: とど.ける、-とど.け、とど.く
jp_example_words:
届け(とどけ): report, notification, registration
届く(とどく): reach
届ける(とどける): deliver
jp_readingExamples: 届く (とど.く), 届ける (とど.ける)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The American flag is the reason you need to deliver this package. The flag is inside the package, and you need to deliver it to the president. He lost his old flag, so now it’s up to you to deliver this new one to him. What more of a reason do you need?
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You need to deliver this flag to the president. Imagine yourself running as fast as you can while carrying the parcel in order to get it to him. Your lungs are tired and your legs burn, but you must deliver the flag as soon as possible!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: To deliver this flag is something you just have to do (とど). Need to do. Want to do. There is no one else to do it. This is something only you are equipped to do.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The world depends on you to do this delivery. If you fail, the United States will be ruined. You have to do it! Deliver that flag now! Run! Run!
Ru_Meaning: deliver, reach, arrive, report, notify, forward
Ru_trainchinese: jiè: (сч.слово) созыв, выпуск, счетное слово для событий, встреч, выборов, спортивных мероприятий и т.д.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the reason (由) for the corpse (尸) arrives
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The fall due to drunkness landed the soldier in a pit, but lucky he was saved by a pile of flags.

届字的基本解释

届
jiè
到：届时。届期。
量词，略同于“次”，用于定期的会议或毕业的班级等：上届。应届（指本期的，用于毕业生）。第一届。

届字的汉语字典释义
届字的康熙字典解释
届字的源字形
届字的起名意思

作形容词时指人行路不便，如“届，行不便也。”（《说文》）；作名词时指极限，穷极，如“至天之届，于河之沂。”（晋·陆云诗）；作动词时指到达（指定或规定的日期）；作量词时指周期性事件的次或期，如历届人大代表。

Session
Basic explanation of words
Session
jiè
To: At that time. Expiration date.
A quantifier, a little like "time", is used in regular meetings or graduated classes, etc.: last term. Freshman (refers to the current term, used for graduates). First.
Session

Session
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
Session
Source glyph
Session
Name meaning
When used as an adjective, it refers to the inconvenience of people walking, such as "It is inconvenient to walk." ("Said the text"); when used as a noun, it refers to the limit, the extreme, such as "to the sky, Yuhezhiyi." ); when used as a verb, it refers to arrival (specified or prescribed date); when used as a quantifier, it refers to the time or period of periodic events, such as deputies to the previous National People's Congress.
jiè
1) подходить, наступать (о сроке); точно в (указанный срок)
届时务请出席 офиц. убедительно прошу прибыть в назначенное время
2) раз; очередь
我们的运动会举行了几届了? сколько раз проводился наш спортивный праздник?
3) срок; созыв; сессия; выпуск (цикл обучения)
第一届第八次全体会议 8-й пленум первого созыва
广州第16届亚运会 16-е Азиатские Олимпийские игры в Гуанчжоу
本校第二届招生 школа производит второй набор учащихся

届

Значения

Доставать, достигать; прибывать, доходить; докладывать, заявлять; доставлять

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Экскременты, плод 由 от присевшего человека 尸. Регулярно сообщать о том, что выгребная яма полна, и удалять из неё экскременты.

  • "Посылка была доставлена в мой дом."

Варианты

屆

Radicals: 尸, 由  (flag, reason)
Meaning Mnemonic
The American flag is the reason you need to deliver this package. The flag is inside the package, and you need to deliver it to the president. He lost his old flag, so now it’s up to you to deliver this new one to him. What more of a reason do you need?
You need to deliver this flag to the president. Imagine yourself running as fast as you can while carrying the parcel in order to get it to him. Your lungs are tired and your legs burn, but you must deliver the flag as soon as possible!
Reading Mnemonic
To deliver this flag is something you just have to do (とど). Need to do. Want to do. There is no one else to do it. This is something only you are equipped to do.
The world depends on you to do this delivery. If you fail, the United States will be ruined. You have to do it! Deliver that flag now! Run! Run!
